strapiPost.title: The Spark Foundation Running For Personal And Community Health
strapiPost.content:
The Spark Foundation is here to help you reach all your health and fitness resolutions this year by helping you set achievable goals with their free resources and race opportunities.

  • On your mark: Give yourself a finish line to run towards by signing up for one of The Spark Foundation's races this year. Races are planned throughout Northwest Arkansas in partnership with other local organizations.
  • Run for good: All money raised by the Spark Foundation races goes back into the community through physical education programs, after-school run clubs, playground equipment improvements, and other organizations that support healthy lifestyles.

Find more ways to get involved HERE.
